#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long n,k,m,cur,ans=0;
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&k,&m);
        cur=n;
        while(1)
        {
            if((double)cur * (double)k>(double)m)
				break;
            cur=cur * k;
            ans++;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
